PRODUCT CONSTRAINTS 1.1 Purpose of the the Product 1.1.1 Background to the Project Effort The need for a method of visualisation of biological data has been identified.,0
Currently, there are many groups offering many different tools for visualising data.,0
These visualisation tools provide a range from tabular to three-dimensional graphical views.,0

However, a need has been identified for a tool that can display data in a three dimensional environment, which allows the user to investigate the data and easily see various attributes of the data at a glance.,0
A need for the above-mentioned tool has been identified and, there being no applicable tool available, a project to create such a tool was conceptualised.,0
The primary stakeholder (see 1.2.1) has made the case that the tool to be created is of relevance use and there is a real need for it.,0
This need is established through continual use of other similar tools and a continued identification of their shortfalls.,0
1.1.2 Goals of the Product We want to give the user the ability to visualise and investigate their data in a three dimensional environment.,0
The user should have the ability to see (at a glance) the differences of various selected attributes of their data.,1
The overall goal of this product is to provide the users with something that has previously been unavailable.,1
